page.title: 03Dale House Farm
page.content: { Mr Holloway}has been in charge of {Dale House Farm}since 1971. His father bought the farm in 1949 and now lives in a bungalow near the main farm house. This was originally built about 150 years ago, The{Holloways have 2 children a daughter and a son. Mr Holloway has two assistants one trained at agricultural college. The other is about to be trained. He has tractors, a combine for corn, ploughs, mowers, forage harvesters, drill rotators and rollers to help in farm work. He has a generator to avoid effects of power cuts ,especially on his milking machines. Mr Holloway did not take holidays until the last few years. Now he is a member of the dairy study group which visits various parts of Europe studying farms methods.He plays Badminton and Rugby for relaxation.
